hiveArticle.title: Visit to Bangla Sahib Gurudwara, Delhi, India
hiveArticle.body:
I have recently visited to Bangla Sahib Gurudwara which is situated in Capital City of India i.e. Delhi. 

Main Entrance 

![IMG_20180422_144744.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcyGEhVGpEiqzbfgq79gS3f9x3deodwtMcXaL4mrAmTWA/IMG_20180422_144744.jpg)

Entrance to the Temple

![IMG_20180422_145224.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTJaUD4Msz7EVwK5JUz8njVWQX4fWx3buF8Fa5LodmQ97/IMG_20180422_145224.jpg)

Entrance to the Gurudwara

![IMG_20180422_150824.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmT5Nwu7LvJXazyQvgs5gGsY3sYp3ypyHQHtUiGvo8bjVb/IMG_20180422_150824.jpg)

A brief history of  Gurudwara Bangla Sahib

![IMG_20180422_151014.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUWkAAdYPRbyQUVGz3TpY1ZDy113St7xMyibhS28D8LhE/IMG_20180422_151014.jpg)



Inside of Gurudwara

![IMG_20180422_150751.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaZd7CEFvPLufZsBZcqCmvxzeHBZ1BL2k4YW37iGG3yxs/IMG_20180422_150751.jpg)

A Pond inside Gurudwara

![IMG_20180422_150738.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmNi1L86YathdRhHC5EMZPjKm9XKUCxBDWBxZnzxtvC1dK/IMG_20180422_150738.jpg)

Worshipping Place

![IMG_20180422_145811.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZQQnVvXyR37Mp8zHodYUsZXeai6gjhnK53fXCUJjE88d/IMG_20180422_145811.jpg)

Decorations Made of Flowers

![IMG_20180422_144812.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmYyjtfvxccJDj9aywiQaExGuerJ24BFCbtkNHbKMLfRaV/IMG_20180422_144812.jpg)

Camera : Nokia 6
